input: python program to display date and time
python program to add two numbers
python program to print ASCII Value of a character
python program to check the entered password is valid or not
output:
Some of Validations are:-

	At least 1 letter between [a-z] and 1 letter between [A-Z]
	At least 1 digit between[0-9]
	At least 1 special character from [$#@]
	Minimum Length : 6 characters
	Maximum Length : 16 characters

<CODESTART><CODELN-PY>import re

pswd = input('Enter Password : ')
pswdlen = len(pswd)


if pswdlen < 6 or pswdlen > 16:
	print('Password length must be in 6 to 16 range') 
elif not re.search("[a-z]"<COMMA> pswd):
	print("At least 1 letter between [a-z]")
elif not re.search("[A-Z]"<COMMA> pswd):
	print("At least 1 letter between [A-Z]")
elif not re.search("[0-9]"<COMMA> pswd):
	print("At least 1 digit between [0-9]")
elif not re.search("[$#@]"<COMMA>pswd):
	print("At least 1 special charecter from [$#@]")
else:
	print("Password is Perfect")<CODEEND>

input: python program to print maximum and minimum of 2 given numbers if equal print both are equal
output:
<CODESTART><CODELN-PY>no1 = 79
no2 = 68


if no1 > no2:
	print(str(no1)+' is Maximum')
	print(str(no2)+' is Minimum')
elif no2 > no1:
	print(str(no2)+' is Maximum')
	print(str(no1)+' is Minimum')
else:
	print('Both are Equal')<CODEEND>

input: python program to check the whether an alphabet is a vowel or consonant
output:
<CODESTART><CODELN-PY>alpha = input("Enter Alphabet : ")


if alpha in 'aeiouAEIOU':
	print(alpha+' is a Vowel')
else:
	print(alpha+' is a Consonant')<CODEEND>

input: python program to print all numbers between given range
output:
<CODESTART><CODELN-PY>start = int(input('Enter Starting Number : '))
end = int(input('Enter Ending Number : '))


for i in range(start<COMMA> end+1):
	print(i)<CODEEND>

input: python program to check whether a number is Prime or not
output:
<CODESTART><CODELN-PY>num = int(input("Enter a Number : "))
flg = False


for i in range(2<COMMA>num):
	if num % i == 0:
		flg = True
		break


if not flg:
	print(num<COMMA> "is a Prime number")
else:
	print(num<COMMA> "is not a Prime number")<CODEEND>
